references.title: Coding games
references.description: Advanced Experience using JavaScript concepts such as (Higher order functions, callback functions and closures). Also having a good understanding of JavaScript ES6 features such as (Arrow functions, destructuring, Template literals and Promises). Using all of that to build amazing and awesome games and applications. This is a fun way to improve my JavaScript skills.

references.title: Creating Apps
references.description: Advanced Experience using ReactJs concepts such as (class and functional components, React Router and Hooks). Also having a good understanding of Redux. Using all of that to build amazing and awesome applications and Templates

references.title: Templates Ninja
references.description: Creating responsive websites using CSS, Flexbox and CSS Grid, develop interactive websites and UI (User Interface) applications using Bootstrap, SASS, JavaScript and HTML

projects.title: Fighting Game
projects.description: This is a JavaScript Practicing Project By using javascript latest features and oop classes to build the game.In order to play the game properly you need a keyboard to move the characters, Just Click on the Live Demo Link and enjoy

projects.title: My Reads
projects.description: A bookshelf app that allows a user to select and categorize books as currently reading, want to read, or have read. The project emphasizes using React to build the application and provides an API server.

projects.title: Memory Card Game
projects.description: This is a Memory game project from Udacity Front-End Nanodegree program, this game is very simple and fun, you can read the Rules from github repo to know how to play it, I hope you enjoy it.

projects.title: Arcade Game
projects.description: This is a Arcade game project from udacity Front-End Nanodegree program.In this game you have a Player and Enemies (Bugs). The goal of the player is to reach the water, without colliding into any one of the enemies.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: This is a practice project on ReactJs. In this project you can enter your city and country then by using the weather API it will get the current Temperature and Humidity. This is a basic Weather React App.

projects.title: TodoList App
projects.description: This is a practice project on ReactJs. In this project you can enter your name and your age into the list and you can also remove it from the list. This is a basic Todo App.

projects.title: CRUD App
projects.description: This is a practice project on ReactJs. In this project you can add new courses or delete existing one.
